author: awiner
msg: TRINIDAD-735: '_checkLoad is not defined' error opening lightweight dialog in FireFox
- Move popup dialog launching code out of onload handler and into _checkLoad
- And, in particular, move it to the *end* of onload, instead of (effectively) before onload
- Why this works, dunno:  in Moz, showing the popup dialog iframe somehow is triggering
onload to run a second time with incorrect state
- Also added code to clean up the dialog DOM after it's hidden

msg: The history ext should work on Source and Feed

msg: Set the default charset for the abstract writer options
